title: S12 Ep133: Cursed in the Carolinas: Stories of the Damned
itunes:title: Cursed in the Carolinas: Stories of the Damned
description:
Patty Wilson joins us to regale us with real life stories that will leave you wondering whether the resulting tragedies were simply bad luck, coincidences or something far more sinister.
